Package: com.github.marschall.pathclassloader

[Java] Class PathClassLoader

      • com.github.marschall.pathclassloader.PathClassLoader

      • Loads classes from a certain java.nio.file.Path.

        Class loading will will happen in a parent first manner which is the Java SE default may.

        • Constructor Summary

            Constructors 
            Constructor and description
            PathClassLoader (java.nio.file.Path path)
            Creates a new PathClassLoader with no parent class loader.
            PathClassLoader (java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.ClassLoader parent)
            Creates a new PathClassLoader with a parent class loader.

        • Constructor Detail

          • public PathClassLoader(java.nio.file.Path path)

            Creates a new PathClassLoader with no parent class loader.

            Parameters:
            path - the path from with to load the classes

          • public PathClassLoader(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.ClassLoader parent)

            Creates a new PathClassLoader with a parent class loader.

            Parameters:
            path - the path from with to load the classes
            parent - the class loader from which to try loading classes first
